attributes.action: support Ms Gillian Gibbons by nstopping aid to Sudan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is clear now that Sudan have no tolerance even in the face of international condemnation for putting Ms Gibbons in jail. Lets stop supporting the Sudanese and not give anymore aid.

rejection.details:
Mrs Gibbons has now been released.

http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/stopsudanaid/
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
